div.p: Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xxvijo die mensis maij anno et cetera lxxv

quo die
henricus hartwik optinuit clameum suum penes clameum viijxx piscium li
kelyne cum ijbus et xx s' et iiijor d' contra et aduersus thomam Watson de bervy'
in defectu ipsius thome non comparentis prout patet per actum desuper factum
Et th Pro qua summa et introitu dicti thome die prefixo Thomas prat et
Johannes chapman deuenerunt plegij et fideiussores ad satisfaciendum dictam
summam cum costis et expensis per eundem henricum factis in defectu dicti thome Watson
eo quod defecit in probacione prout obligatur secundum tenorem acti inde confecti et
ad satisfaciendum dictam summam dicto henrico aut suis procuratoribus vni uel pluribus infra terminum Juris

In curia ballivorum tenta xxixo die mensis et anni prescriptorum Johannes goyn in amerciamento per
confessionem propriam pro perturbacione Johannis nory piscatoris et emendabit eidem prout Jura volunt

Duncanus leis et Johannes bartlotson ipsorum quilibet in amerciamento pro perturbacione adinuicem et emendabit alter
altri ad visum proborum virorum

Jacobus Kennerty et thomas litstar ipsorum quilibet conuictus per assisam pro perturbacione alter alterius
amerciatur
Johannes nory amerciatur pro perturbacione Johannis goyn prout compertum fuit per assisam et cetera

Die secunda Junij anno et cetera lxxv thomas sadlar et Johannes tailyour ipsorum quilibet in amerciamento pro pertur
bacione adinuicem Similiter dictus thomas amerciatur pro perturbacione vxoris dicti Johannis et ipsa
in amerciamento quia perturbavit eundem thomam prout compertum fuit per assisam

Curia ballivorum tenta tercio die mensis et annj suprascriptorum Nicholaus baxtar ex parte
vxoris sue amerciatur pro perturbacione Johannis gray

Willelmus moir adiudicatur in ijbus amerciamentis in vno videlicet pro perturbacione Johannis gray et in alio
pro perturbacione iniusta Duncanj mortimare veluti deliberatum fuit per assisam

The v day of Junij the yer' of god et cetera lxxv yeris . As anent the claming of
custum of salmonde clamit be Johne of mar ane of the custumaris and princi
pale ressauour til our soueran lord / the hail communite was callit to the tolbuthe
and for the maist part comperit the same day before none / And thai all
thare beand present with hail assent and consent tuke apon thame that thai
wauld pay na custume for Salmond for the termis that our soueran lorde
has gefin and grauntit til thaim be his lettres vndir his priue seil and the
subscripcione of his avne hand bot thai wauld vtraly byde at thare
defens thareof and kepe the custumaris vnscathit eftir the tenour of our'
soueran lordis lettre gefin to thame tharapon et cetera

The ix day of june the yer' et cetera lxxv Comperit before the aldirman and baillies
sittand in Jugement Wil of murray producit in witnes be Adam of crafurd the
quhilk the gret aith sworne deponit that Androw branche and thom Jamyson tuke
a watir of the thrid part of a net of the pot fra Adam of crafurd for twa
barellis of salmond and demi barrel / And that androw branche sould gif til thom Jamyson
vij s' tofreith him of the half barel / and that the said Adam sould deliuer til thom iamyson
twa tvme barellis . bot quhethir he promittit til deliuer him the salt to the making of
the said fisch or nocht he wate nocht et cetera

Curia legalis ballivorum tenta in pretorio xixo die Junij anno suprascripto quo die
sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

Eodem die Willelmus meirnys carpentarius posuit se in voluntate ballivorum pro
perturbacione andree scot pro qua amerciatur et emendabit parti prout Jura volunt

Willelmus giffard primo die vocatus ad sectam Walteri morison ad respondendum plegio
porrecto super eundem in manibus alexandri chavmer sergeandi pro iniusta detencione
xlijrum solidorum a dicto Waltero Non comparuit Et Ideo precipitur seriando quod ca
piat districtum ab eodem ad valorem amerciamenti curie et ad premuniendum eundem ad proximam
curiam legalem tanquam 2m diem processus

Alexander trail inuenit alexandrum hay plegium legalem de indempnitate andree branche et
Dauid howy aliter quam Jura volunt Similiter alexander menyes deuenit plegius legalis
pro dictis andrea et Dauid de indempnitate alexandri trail

Item dictus Dauid howy inuenit andream rettre plegium de indempnitate patricij famuli alexandri
trail Et alexander trail plegius pro dicto patricio quod dictus Dauid erit indempnis
aliter quam Jura volunt et cetera

The xxiij day of June the yer' et cetera lxxv Comperit before the aldirman and baillies
in Jugement Dauid mathoson as tutour til his brothir son Johne mathosonis cla
mand William quelp of xl s' of mail of thre yeris termez at Witsonda last
bigane for a chavmer pertening as he said to his said brotheris son callit
William mathoson / and chargit him for to devode and red the said chavmer til him on the said
childis behalf / the quhilk William quelp allegit that he had the said chavmer
free but ony mail paying vnto the tyme that it be qwite oute And
askit at the aldirman and baillies ane lachfull day to produce his witnessing
tharapon be suffisant write or lachfull preif / to the quhilk thai assignit
this day xl dais And failyeand of his witnessing or preif as said is
at the said day he sal Red the said chavmer and pay the said mail til
the said Dauid mathoson as tutour til the said barne

The same day gilbert of chavmer ane of the baillies has tane til preve
this day xv dais that Johne Donaldsonnis wif aucht him xiiij s' clamit
be him fra the said Johne as intromettour with quhilum his said wiffis gudis as
he allegit and that he soulde preve the said day that the said Johne
intromettit with quhilum his said wiffis gudis eftir hir decesse And the
said Johne has fundin Dauy blabir law borch til him gif it happinnis
him to produce his preve as said is of the intrometting with the gudis as was
deliuerit be ane assise and optenis his clame that he sal do for the said
Johne as law wil Et dictus Dauid blabir constituit patricium badenach /
burgensem huius burgi suum procuratorem ad agendum et defendum pro eo tanquam plegio predicti Johannis
penes plegiagium antedictum prout Jura volunt Et promisit de Rato cum ceteris
clausulis necessariis et oportunis
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxviio die Junij anno et cetera lxxvto

quo die Willelmus
blindsel filius alexandri adiudicatur in amerciamento per confessionem propriam pro iniusta perturbacione
Willelmi robertson et emendabit eidem prout Jura volunt Insuper dictus
Willelmus accusatus fuit pro perturbacione gilberti chavmer vnius ballivorum in ministracione
sui officij et quitus factus fuit per assisam de omni perturbacione eiusdem Similiter
dictus balliuus accusatus de perturbacione eiusdem Willelmi blindsel assisa deliber
auit quod ipse non fecit dicto Willelmo in ministracione sui officij prout de Jure debuisset

Die xxviija Junij anno et cetera lxxv Alexander perpoynt anglicus constituit et ordinavit
Johannem Wormot burgensem de aberdene suum verum legitimum et indubitatem procuratorem ad
prosequendum exigendum et recuperandum omnia debita sive per quoscumque debitores infra
burgum de aberdene de Et signanter a Willelmo quelp et Johanne litstar filio quondam
ade litstar duas barellas salmonum mensure de hamburgh Et pro ipso constituenti
et nomine suo agendum et defendendum cum ceteris procuratorij clausulis necessariis et oportunis

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio vltima die Junij anno prescripto ballivi posuerunt in respectu
wardam et Judicium plegii porrecti per Willelmum quelp et Recontrariacionem eiusdem per
Johannem Wormot propter debilitatem curie vsque diem lune proximo futuro

Curia legalis tenta per balliuos tercia die Julij anno et cetera lxxv quo die sectis
vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

The same day Androw lammyntoune grauntit in Jugement that he aucht til
Dauid of Kyntor burges of this burgh foure merkis and ix s' for his
fadir det quham god assoilye tobe pait til the said Dauid or his procuratouris
at fastrinsevyn next tocum but ony langar delay fraude or gile

Eodem die Willelmus giffard secundo die vocatus ad sectam Walteri murison pro
iniusta detencione xlij s' non comparuit Et ideo precipitur sergeando quod capiat
districtum et cetera et ad premuniendum eundem ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam tercium diem processus

Vxor Willelmi cummyn amerciatur pro iniusta perturbacione andree cummyn prout inuentum
fuit per assisam et emendabit eidem prout Jura volunt et cetera

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio sexto die Julij anno et cetera lxxvto Johannes fichet adiudi
cabatur in amerciamento curie pro perturbacione iniusta Johannis nory piscatoris et iniusta capcione
vnius remi de li cobil ab eodem et emendabit dampnum prout Jura volunt

Johannes skynnar conuictus per assisam de iniusta perturbacione Johannis Vaus vnius sergean
dorum in verbo et pro perturbacione Johannis pardonar et cuiusdam alterius Johannis adiudicatur
in tribus amerciamentis et emendabit prout Jura volunt

Similiter Johannes pardonar et alter Johannes ipsorum quilibet in amerciamento pro perturbacione dicti
Johannis skynnar et emendabunt ut supra et cetera

Die xa Julij anno predicto Dauid spens amerciatur pro perturbacione iniusta thome blindsel
et suorum seruiencium prout compertum fuit per assisam et emendabit dampnum prout Jura volunt

Ricardus litstar similiter adiudicatur in amerciamento pro perturbacione dicti thome et emendabit
parti lese ad visum proborum virorum

Willelmus blindsel filius thome deuenit plegius legalis pro thoma blindsel de indempnitate
Dauid spens aliter quam et per viam Juris Similiter dictus Dauid inuenit Walterum mori
son plegium de indempnitate dicti thome

Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio xvij die menis Julij Anno
Domini et cetera lxxv

quo die Willelmus giffard vocatus ad sectam Walteri morison
pro iniusta detencione de xlij s' ab eodem Waltero non comparuit Ideo precipitur sergeando ad capiendum districtum et cetera et ad
premuniendum eundem Willelmum ad comparendum ad proximam Curiam legalem tanquam
ad quartum diem huius processus

The same day Johne of spens litstar askit at the bailleis in court sittand in Juge
ment toger him be servit of his fadir gudis pertening til him be resone of ayr
schip And incontinent the bailleis callit Anny the spous' of quhilum Adam litstar and
Inquirit at hir' quhy . that scho deliuerit nocht that Ayrschip that the said Johne
clamit tohaf resone to / Thomas of fiffe forspekar' to the said Anny sayd
in hir name that it was vnkend til hir that he was ony are hiddirtillis til haf
ony gudis quhilkis he clamit tilhaf as are til his fadir that was in hir
governance or keping And quhen that he war kend as are til his fadir of sik
gudis that he clamit til haue of his scho sould ansuer' him and do him that law
waulde / heratour the said Johne of spens litstar presentit Ane lettir of our souerane
lordis vndir his signet to the bailleis chargeand thame totak ane Inquisicio
ne of the best and / wourthiast and eldast of knaulage and vnsuspect persons
token quhat the forsaid Johne had resone to of his clames . and toger him
be servit eftir as thai fand that he had rycht and resone And to the fulfilling
of the commaund of the said lettre the forsaid Anny and thomas of fiffe hir
forspekar war fullely aggreit and content / and was redy tharto in the
tyme in presence of the bailleis and the court et cetera
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xviijo die Julij anno et cetera lxxvto

quo die Andreas
moir et Jacobus craik ipsorum quilibet adiudicatur in amerciamento pro perturbacione adinuicem prout
compertum fuit per assisam et emendabit alter altri prout Jura volunt

The same day the maist part of the counsel than gadderit has chargit
the Aldirman tocommoune with oure Soueran lordis consel and with the lordis
auditouris of the chekar anent the custum of the salmond And to do his dili
gence with help and supple of vthiris frendis tobring the custum til a certane
of the barrel of resonabil price til indure for evir And gif that can nocht
be herd / that he defend in alsfer as he may . that the toune pay na custum
for thare awne propir salmond indurand the termes of fyve yeris eftir as our
soueran lordis lettre made to the toune tharupon proportis and beris vndir our soueran
lordis priue seil and the subscripcione of his awne hand And gif it hap
pinnis that the aldirman beis vext or chargit to warde for the townis
actione the toune sal releue him and pay his costis in and scathis in alsfer
as he sustenis ony scaith or makis costis for thare caus' or ony vthir
commissaris beand in the commissione with the aldirman

Item the said day the consel has deliuerit that thare salbe a mark allowit
til Johne stevinson in his martymes mail tocum quhilk restis vnpait
til him of his fee of prioury . of the yer' bigane And gif he gettis vthir
contentacione or michelmes he salbe content tharewith et cetera

The nyntene day of Julij the yer' et cetera lxxv twiching the debate of the mail that
the baillies clamit and cravit at Sandris trail and Dauy spens of the wattir
belanging quhilum til Cristy litstar' of thre termis bigane / the Aldirman gert
thir personis vndirwritin be sworne tosee and toknaw quha had resone topay the
mail of the said iij termis to the bailyes for the frething of the toune And thir
ar the names of thaim that war sworne in assise tharto Richard of Kyntor
Androw scherar' Johne of Knollis alexander blindsel thom of chavmer gilbert of
chavmer Dauy symson Dauid mathoson and patrik badenach . quhilkis per
sonis declarit be thare athis decretit and endit that Sandris trail and Dauy
spens sould pay to the balyes the maillis of the said thre termys for
the frething of the toune / And thai sal remain with the wattir that was cristy
litstaris ay and quhil thai be fred of the payment of the thre termis in alsfer
as thai haf pait mare than thai haf rycht and resone topay / and na
vthir man to brouke that wattir in the tyme bot allanerly thai quhil thai
be fred as said is in alsfer as thai haue resone et cetera

Memorandum that the x day of Septembre the yer' of our lord M iiijC lxxiiij It was ap
pointtit and accordit betuix Johne androson Richard of Kyntor and Dauid Kintor
bef as executouris factouris and intromettouris til gilbert of Kintor before ane
reuerend fadir in crist Thomas bischop of aberdene in manere and fourme as eftir
folowis that is tosay that the said Dauy Kintor sal haf the tak of the sext
part of the Crois quhilk the said gilbert had of the towne of aberdene for
formaling eftir the tenour of the lettre made to quhilum the said gilbert / for the
quhilk the said Dauy has content and pait til loyk laris thre lastis of sal
mond with consent of the said Reuerend fadir Johne androson and of Richard
of Kintor

Item it was appointit before the forsaid Reuerend fadir with consent of Richard
of Kintor and of Dauid Kintor . that Johne androson sal remain with the landis
of torwothy liand in lthe baronry of Audane . quhil he be content of and
pait of thre score of pundis and fiftene pundis . for the quhilkis the said
Johne pait to my lord of Aberdene twenty and five pundis gretis in flandris
at the bidding of Dauy Kintor and of Richard Kintor

Item the said Johne androson pait in flandris xxxiij s' g' et iiij g' for
gilbert of Kintorris wattir mail / the quhilk the said Johne has reson
tobe pait of again / of the said gilbertis gudis

All thir appointmentis and actis aboue writin war in presence of Dauid symson
ane of the balyes of aberdene witnes Dauid colison and thom prat before
the forsaidis Johne androson Richard of Kintor and Dauid Kyntor in the
tolbuthe of Aberdene the xxvij day of Julij the yer' et cetera lxxv
